entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't install MAUI on Windows 11 #23864
  • Creating an unpackaged Windows Maui app STILL does not work. #23858
  • Unable to start debug session on the Android emulator when airplane mode is enabled. #23855
  • ImageButton CornerRadius not being applied on Android #23854
  • Facing issues with the SearchBar's search icon when applying Dark theme. #23846
  • DatePicker Text hide while hovering in Windows #23843
  • Label-> FormattedString-> Span: Critical Performance Issue #23841
  • MSB4044 The "GenerateRtxt" task was not given a value for the required parameter "JavaPlatformJarPath" #23840

Closed

  • [Android] Convert Modal Implementation over to using Dialog Fragment #22587
    9.0-preview7
  • Delete all of the Use <Control>Handler.Mapper instead mappers that we obsoleted in NET8 #23516
    9.0-preview7
  • Obsolete Setting MainPage and direct users to CreateWindow #23518
    9.0-preview7
  • Button's VisualState is not returning from Pressed to Normal #23848
  • IWKScriptMessageHandlerWithReply has a bad implementation of DidReceiveScriptMessage #23677

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #23865
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WiP] When swapping out ShellItems clear services #23863
  • NuGet auditing package dependencies for security vulnerabilities #23860
  • [net9.0] Comment more failing tests for shell on net9 #23859
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, 9.0-preview7
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #23853
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed a crash for the samples app [User interface concepts -> styles] #23852
    area-docs, area-xaml
  • [Android] SecureStorage: Rework logic to delete shared prefs when key is corrupt #23850

Merged

  • [net9.0] [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23845
    9.0-preview7
  • Revert "[Windows] Add TitleBar Control" #23844
  • [ci] Allow to set the agents for template build #23849
    area-infrastructure
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • [net9] BackButtonBehavior enhancement - Changed IsVisible & IsEnabled BindingMode to OneWay #23467
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-shell, community ✨

Updated

  • [net9.0] Update preview7 packages #23809
    9.0-preview7
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView not showing new items #23779
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Make IWindow.Content nullable #23785
    9.0-preview7
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` (take 2) #23824
    community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
